靧字的基本解释

靧
huì
洗脸：“其间面垢，燂潘请靧。”

靧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huì］
［《廣韻》荒内切，去隊，曉。］
“沬2”的被通假字。
洗脸。

靧字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【面字部】　靧； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1384第39
【廣韻】荒內切【集韻】【韻會】呼內切，?音悔。【玉篇】洗面也。與頮同。【集韻】本作沬。洒面也。【禮·內則】面垢燂潘淸靧。又【玉藻】沐稷而靧梁。

靧字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
靧字的起名意思

暂无。

靧

Wash your face: "Drinking in the meantime, Suopan, please Guan."

[①]［huì］
["Guangyun" cut the barren inside, go to the team, Xiao. ]
"沬2" was passed falsely.
Wash your face.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【Face Character Department】　靧; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1384 Page 39
[Guang Yun] Huang internal cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Call the internal cut, sound regret. [Jade articles] Wash your face too. Same as 頮. [Ji Yun] This is a 沬. Sprinkle the noodles too. 【Li·NeiZe】Pan Cheong-靧 on the face of the scale. [Jade Zao] Mu Ji and Qianliang.
